page.title: 16HOBBIES & ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00 AM.FINISHES AT 3.15 PM.AFTER SCHOOL,HERE ARE SOME OF THE THINGS THE CHILDREN OF OUR SCHOOL DID ONE EVENING:WATCH TELEVISION,RODE THEIR BIKE,PLAYED TENNIS,DID A PAPER ROUND,PLAYED IN THEIR SAND PIT, PRACTISED THE PIANO,READ A BOOK,WENT TO A FARM.MOST WENT TO BED BETWEEN 8.00,AND 10.00 PM,AND GOT UP BETWEEN 6.00 AND 8.00AM:FATHERS LIKED TO DO THESE THINGS AFTER WORK:GARDENING, MESSING ABOUT WITH CARS,PLAYING SPORT (RUGBY SQUASH AND FISHING)AND SLEEPING IN AN EASY CHAIR:MOTHERS LIKED TO DO THESE THINGS IN THE EVENING;KNITTING AND CROTCHET,COOKING,GARDENING,SEWING ,CHATTING,AND WATCHING TELEVISION.
